thread.title: Massachusetts Institute of Technology to launch half MOOC, half in-person master's degree program
thread.title_full: Massachusetts Institute of Technology to launch half MOOC, half in-person master's degree program

title: Massachusetts Institute of Technology to launch half MOOC, half in-person master's degree program
text:
08 Massachusetts Institute of Technology to launch half MOOC, half in-person master's degree program 
Inside Higher Ed: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology will next year launch the first of what could be several pilots to determine if pieces of what it has provided face-to-face can be delivered through massive open online courses.
